desc.cn: Open Asset Import Library 是一个将各种3d 文件格式加载到共享内存格式的库
desc.en: Open Asset Import Library is a library to load various 3d file formats into a shared, in-memory format

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add versions
&& x scoop install versions/assimp3

/git.cmd:
git clone https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg.git
&& cd vcpkg
&& ./bootstrap-vcpkg.sh
&& ./vcpkg integrate install
&& ./vcpkg install assimp
